			<p>On April 6-7, many WICS members attended AthenaHacks 2019, an all-female hackathon at USC! Attendees of the hackathon formed teams and collaborated to create a hack within 24 hours. Two of the teams made up of all-WICS members won an award during the showcase! One team (Amanda Chou, Diana Grande, <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/athenahacks-2019/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>

        				<h2 class="entry-title"><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-winter-quarter-week-9-self-care-session/" rel="bookmark">WICS Winter Quarter Week 9: Self-Care Session</a></h2>        			</div>
        			
        		</div>

        	</div><!--.blog-header-wrap-->
			<p>On March 6, 2019, WICS hosted a Self-Care Session, with fun and de-stressing activities for all the members and the students that attended. We included several stress-relieving activities assigned to each table, and there were fun songs and videos played in the beginning to create a stress-free mood. The main <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-winter-quarter-week-9-self-care-session/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>
